import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { AxiosInstance } from '../Network/AxiosInstance'; export default function MovieDetails() { const [movie, setMovieDetails]=useState({}) const params = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ AxiosInstance .get(`${params.id}?api_key=0635aa13dcf8f77aa3d3a659b24086cc`) .then((res)=>setMovieDetails(res.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) }) return (
